amendment.description: To provide additional amounts for procurement and for research, development, test, and evaluation for Stryker Lethality Upgrades, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1522 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 34. Record Vote Number: 202.

action.text: Amendment SA 1522 proposed by Senator Portman to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3657-3659; text: CR S3658-3659) To provide additional amounts for procurement and for research, development, test, and evaluation for Stryker Lethality Upgrades, and to provide an offset.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1522 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 34. Record Vote Number: 202.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1522 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 34. Record Vote Number: 202.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1522 proposed by Senator Portman to Amendment SA 1463.
